key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on Asian manufacturing hubs
Intense competition from rivals like Western Digital and Toshiba
Geopolitical risks from operations in politically sensitive regions
Workforce reductions impacting morale and operational efficiency
controversies: Layoffs of 480 employees in 2023 as part of cost-cutting measures
Potential regulatory challenges in China due to geopolitical tensions
environmental_issues: Pressure to address electronic waste and energy consumption
Commitment to achieving carbon neutrality by 2030
social_issues: Impact of layoffs on employee morale and community relations
governance_issues: Compliance with global data privacy regulations like GDPR
